<div class="row">
<div class="col-lg-7 mb-60">
<div class="section-title s-section-title mb-35">
<span>Free CC0 Stock Photos</span>
<h2>All the best images to download in one place!</h2>
</div>
<p>At FreeImage.me you can search and browse free stock photos from multiple sources. Instead of having to go through and search different websites one by one, you'll find all the free images you need with us where you can save them for later use. We are constantly adding new sources.</p>
<p>You can use our filters to sort through searches, either by orientation, size and license. We also have a pretty good color search if you are working by a set color scheme.</p>
</div>
<div class="col-lg-1"></div>
<div class="col-lg-4 mb-90">
<div class="section-title s-section-title mb-35">
<span>Join us</span>
<h2>Sign up for a free account</h2>
</div>
<p>Signing up for a free account allows you to Like your favorite images and/or collect images into private collections for later use.</p>

            $('.img_like').click(function(){
               var ts = $(this);
               if(!ts.hasClass('active')){
                  ts.addClass('active');

                  });
               }else{
                  ts.removeClass('active');
                  $.ajax({
                     url:'https://freeimage.me/image-dislike',
                     type:'post',
                     data:'img='+ts.data('id'),
                     success:function(data){
                     }
                  });
               }
            });
         });
         var tmpar = [];
         
         function searchcolletion(start,val,perpage)
         {
           var tt = [];
           $('.pg').html('');

           var searchField = val;
           var expression = new RegExp(searchField, "i");

           $.when( 
             $.each(tmpar, function(key, value){
               if (value.search(expression) != -1)
               {
                 tt.push(value);
               }
             }) 
           ).done(function() {
            $('.srch').css('display','none');
            $('.no-found').css('display','none');
            $('.modal-pagination').html('');

             if(tt.length>=1)
             {
               var pgcount = ((tt.length - 1) / perpage) + 1;
               var cal = start * perpage;
               var strt = cal - perpage;


               if(pgcount>=1)
               {
                 for(var p=1;p<=pgcount;p++)
                 {
                  if(start==p)
                  {
                     $('.modal-pagination').append('<li class="active"><a href="javascript:;"  data-page="'+p+'">'+p+'</a></li>');
                  }else{
                        $('.modal-pagination').append('<li><a href="javascript:;" class="pagination_click" data-page="'+p+'">'+p+'</a></li>');
                  }
                 }
                 var lmtpage = strt + perpage;


                 if(tt.length <= lmtpage)
                 {
                   lmtpage = tt.length;
                 }

                 for(var t= strt;t<lmtpage;t++)
                 {
                     $(".srch").filter(function() {
                        return $(this).text().trim() === tt[t];
                     }).css("display", "block");
                     // $(".srch:contains("+tt[t]+")").css("display", "block");
                 }
               }
             }else{
               $('.srch').css('display','none');
               $('.no-found').css('display','block');
               $('.modal-pagination').html('');
             }
           });
         }

         searchcolletion(1,'',9);

         $(document).ready(function(){

            $('#cl_tags').tagsinput();

            $(document).on('click','.pagination_click',function(e){
               e.preventDefault();
               var srval = $('#search_collection').val();
               var srpg = $(this).attr('data-page');
               searchcolletion(srpg,srval,9);
            });   

            $('#search_collection').keyup(function(){
                var srval = $(this).val();
               searchcolletion(1,srval,9);
             });

            $('#add_new_cl').click(function(){
               $('.active-box').slideUp();
               $('#add_cl_div').slideDown();
            });
            $('.back-btn').click(function(){
               $('#add_cl_div').slideUp();
               $('.active-box').slideDown();
            });
            // $('.collection-list').click( function(){
            //    $(this).addClass('active');
            // });
            $(document).on('click','.all_page_add_collection',function(){
               var p_value=$(this).attr('data-id');
               if(p_value!='')
               {
                  $.ajax({
                     type:'post',
                     url:'https://freeimage.me/get-photo-collection-list',
                     data:'photo='+p_value,
                     success:function(data){
                        $('#addcollection_modal').modal('show');
                        $('#hdn_photo').val(p_value);
                        // var obj = JSON.parse(data);
                        var tt = data.dt;
                        
                        $('.all_photo_page_cl').each(function(){
                           var dd = $(this);
                           var nm = parseInt(dd.attr('data-id'));
                           if($.inArray(nm, tt) !== -1)
                           {
                              dd.addClass('active delete-from-cl');
                           }else{
                              dd.addClass('add-to-cl');
                           }
                        });
                     }
                  });
               }
            });
            $('#addcollection_modal').on('hidden.bs.modal', function () {
                $(".all_photo_page_cl").removeClass("active delete-from-cl add-to-cl");
                $('#add_cl_form')[0].reset();
                $("#hdn_photo").val('');
                $('#alertdiv').css('display','none');
                $('#alertsuccess').css('display','none');
                $('#cl_tags').tagsinput('removeAll');
               $('#cl_tags').tagsinput('refresh');
            });
            $('#add_cl_form').submit(function(){
               $('.collection-loader').css('display','block');
               var add_cl_form = $(this);
               $('#alertdiv').css('display','none');
               $('#alertsuccess').css('display','none');
               $.ajax({
                  type:'post',
                  url:'https://freeimage.me/add-new-collection',
                  data:$(this).serialize()+'&p='+$('#hdn_photo').val(),
                  success:function(data){
                     $('.collection-loader').css('display','none');
                     // var obj=JSON.parse(data);
                     if(data.success=='true')
                     {
                        var insrt = '<div class="col-lg-4 col-md-4 col-sm-6 col-xs-12 srch-box srch" style="display: none;"><div class="all_photo_page_cl collection-list clearfix active delete-from-cl" data-id="'+data.collection.id+'"><p id="'+data.collection.id+'">';
                           if(data.collection.private==1){
                              insrt+='<i class="fas fa-lock"></i>';
                           }
                           insrt+='&nbsp;'+data.collection.name+'</p><button type="button" class="add-collection"><i class="fas fa-plus"></i><i class="fas fa-check"></i></button></div></div>';

                           // $('.no-found').before(insrt);
                           $('#collection_list_box .search-box').after(insrt);
                           tmpar.unshift(data.collection.name);
                           searchcolletion(1,'',9);
                           add_cl_form[0].reset();
                           $('.back-btn').trigger('click');
                           $('#alertsuccess').text('New Collection Added Successfully');
                           $('#alertsuccess').css('display','block');
                        // window.location.reload();
                     }else{
                        $('#alertdiv').html('something went wrong..');
                        $('#alertdiv').css('display','block');
                     }
                  }
               });
            });
            $(document).on('click','.add-to-cl',function(){
               $('.collection-loader').css('display','block');

               $('#alertdiv').css('display','none');
               $('#alertsuccess').css('display','none');
               var cl_value=$(this).attr('data-id');
               var ts = $(this);
               if(cl_value!='')
               {
                  $.ajax({
                     type:'post',
                     url:'https://freeimage.me/add-image-collection',
                     data:'cl='+cl_value+'&p='+$('#hdn_photo').val(),
                     success:function(data){
                        $('.collection-loader').css('display','none');
                        // var obj=JSON.parse(data);
                        if(data.success=='true')
                        {
                           ts.addClass('active delete-from-cl');
                           ts.removeClass('add-to-cl');
                           $('#alertsuccess').text('Image added to collection successfully.');
                           $('#alertsuccess').css('display','block');
                           // window.location.reload();
                        }else{
                           $('#alertdiv').html('This image is already added in this collection.');
                           $('#alertdiv').css('display','block');
                        }
                     }
                  });
               }
            });
            $(document).on('click','.delete-from-cl',function(){
               $('.collection-loader').css('display','block');
               $('#alertdiv').css('display','none');
               $('#alertsuccess').css('display','none');
               var ts = $(this);
               var cl_value=$(this).attr('data-id');
               if(cl_value!='')
               {
                  $.ajax({
                     type:'post',
                     url:'https://freeimage.me/remove-image-collection',
                     data:'cl='+cl_value+'&p='+$('#hdn_photo').val(),
                     success:function(data){
                        $('.collection-loader').css('display','none');
                        // var obj=JSON.parse(data);
                        if(data.success=='true')
                        {
                           ts.addClass('add-to-cl');
                           ts.removeClass('active delete-from-cl');
                           $('#alertsuccess').text('Image removed from collection successfully.');
                           $('#alertsuccess').css('display','block');
                           // window.location.reload();
                        }else{
                           $('#alertdiv').html('something went wrong..');
                           $('#alertdiv').css('display','block');
                        }
                     }
                  });
               }
            });
         });
      </script>
